thread.section_title: Hotel Queen Mary - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect for a few days in Paris.
thread.title_full: Perfect for a few days in Paris. - Review of Hotel Queen Mary, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Noam B
title: Perfect for a few days in Paris.
text: The hotel is located near the opera in a walking distance from most of the touristic monuments. There are a lot of restaurants, cafes and shopping options near and a supermarket just down the street. The staff is very friendly and helpful, wi-fi is fast even in the fifth floor and the rooms are well designed, clean and comfortable. I booked this place the night before my arrival and I has a strike of luck with it!
